channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Reverse Proxy Auth Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Reverse Proxy Auth Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-32987|2024-08-02T15:32:46.208Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20reverse%20proxy%20auth%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Reverse Proxy Auth Plugin 1.7.4 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified LDAP server using attacker-specified credentials.
